examples.example: 在人生的旅途中，我们总会碰到许多有趣的人和事。

translate.english: In the journey of life, we will always encounter many interesting people and things.

examples.example: 在探索未知的道路上，我们经常会碰到各种惊喜和挑战。

translate.english: On the road of exploring the unknown, we often encounter all kinds of surprises and challenges.

examples.example: 在逛街的时候，我幸运地碰到了许久未见的好朋友。

translate.english: When shopping, I was lucky to run into a good friend who I haven't seen for a long time.
